text: Hip-hop-influenced South Korean band, who made their debut in the city less than a year ago, will appear at Star Hall, Kitec, in Kowloon Bay South Korean, hip-hop-influenced, K-pop boy band Monsta X are returning for a second show in Hong Kong, less than one year after making their debut in the city. Monsta X first appeared in Hong Kong at AsiaWorld-Expo last July. Their second Hong Kong show will take place at Star Hall in Kowloon Bay’s Kitec centre on July 10. Ticketing details have yet to be announced.
title: K-pop boy band Monsta X return to Hong Kong in July for concert | South China Morning Post
